cu.explanation_en: Setting gNB_ID to an invalid hexadecimal format 'invalid_hex' will cause parsing errors during configuration loading and prevent the CU from initializing properly.

du.explanation_en: Setting global_log_level to an invalid enum value 'debug_invalid' will cause logging configuration failures and may lead to runtime errors in the DU.
du.explanation_zh: 將 global_log_level 設定為無效的枚舉值 'debug_invalid'，會導致日誌配置失敗，並可能在 DU 中導致運行時錯誤。
